description:
Ange creates an uproar when she forces her way into the Uryu`s household. The next morning, knowing the Nuko Club is on the verge of shutting down, Shingo asks to join the club. The club needs more members to save itself. When Shingo gets caught in the rain on his way home from school, he ends up escaping the weather at Airi`s apartment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: てさぐり色のバスタイム
